TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JustInTimeActivationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class JustInTimeActivationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class JustInTimeActivationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 打开或关闭实时 (JIT) 激活。

span.span: Turns just-in-time (JIT) activation on or off.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定了 JIT 激活，则不得在 COM + 目录中禁用此激活，反之亦然。If JIT activation is specified, then it must not be disabled in the COM+ catalog, and vice versa. 如果在 COM + 目录中启用，则必须在组件上指定它。If enabled in the COM+ catalog, it must be specified on the component. 对于 COM + 中配置的组件，JIT 激活默认为 off，但如果请求自动事务，则会自动启用。JIT activation defaults to off for components which are configured in COM+, but is enabled automatically if automatic transactions are requested. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅 [特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此特性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CPP/inspector.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/CS/inspector.cs#0)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Pooling#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Pooling/VB/inspector.vb#0)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并可以选择通过将 作为参数传递允许禁用实时 (JIT) 激活。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, optionally allowing the disabling of just-in-time (JIT) activation by passing as the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `val` `false` 如果 事务的值是 `Supported` 、 `Required` 或， `RequiresNew` 则 JIT 激活是必需的，并且不能设置为。JIT activation is required and `val` cannot be set to `false` if the value for the transaction is `Supported`, `Required`, or `RequiresNew`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新的 。The following code example creates a new .
